title: Was the Nintendo Direct a Disappointment? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.18.21
description:
Greg and Tim recap yesterday's Nintendo Direct, Bungie's big moves, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:03:03 - Housekeeping
There’s a new episode of the Blessing Show up on youtube.com/kindafunnygames! It’s all about Next-Gen 4 months later.
Need more Blessing? He, Tim, Andy, and Kev’s reactions to the MK trailer over on youtube.com/kindafunny
The Wild Aces Take on the Beasts Saturday at 5 pm PT on twitch.tv/kindaufunnygames, but Austin Ekler is on the Kinda Funny podcast right now!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: GrahamOfLegend, David Meintel, Trent Berrie, Black Jack, Luiz Aguiar (@8bitLuiz), James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), &The Nano Biologist
The Roper Report   -
00:06:30 - Nintendo Direct Report, Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:12:00 - Do you think hard-core fan's personal expectations of Nintendo's release schedule (from 2017-2019) have warped fans perception and their expectations with 2020-2021, when we are living in different times? - Best Friends Q:Sapphire Diamond ruby
00:24:00 - Did Nintendo need to bring directs back or are they better off with out? - Best Friends Q:TomDac99
00:29:25 - SILENT HILL What’s Bloober Team Up to? Brendan Sinclair, GIB
00:36:00 -  Ad
00:41:48 -  Big Moves at Bungie, Eddie at GameSpot
00:48:00 - Would this bring you a lapsed player (or any lapsed player) back? - Best Friends Q:Borzen00
00:54:25 - Fall Guys Coming to Xbox
00:55:40 - COD Zombies Leak, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:56:50 - No More Little Nightmares (Probably), Joe Skrebbles @ IGN
00:59:20 - Out today
01:02:40 - Squad Up:Nick F from NY(Xbox) - th3 b0y won1da
01:04:15 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Julia Hardy
